title: Cashmere Fingerless Gloves—Heather Rose
description:
These cashmere Fingerless Gloves are perfect for those chilly days when you need your fingertips free to use your smartphone, but you don't want to give in completely to the cold. Stylish, warm, and practical, these Fingerless Gloves cover from wrist to knuckles and come in an array of colors. For men and women. 100% cashmere. One size.

Color:  Heather Rose Pink 

Size:  3 in. W x 9.25 in. H
